text: Wu Yibing was the defending champion, but was no longer eligible to participate in junior tournaments. Thiago Seyboth Wild won the title, defeating Lorenzo Musetti in the final, 6–1, 2–6, 6–2.https://www.usopen.org/en_US/news/articles/2018-09-08/juniors_wrap_seyboth_wild_upsets_top_seed_to_reach_us_open_boys_singles_final.html == Seeds == == Main draw == === Finals === === Top half === ==== Section 1 ==== ==== Section 2 ==== === Bottom half === ==== Section 3 ==== ==== Section 4 ==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky Loser=== # Henry Squire ===Draw=== ====First Qualifier==== ====Second Qualifier==== ====Third Qualifier==== ====Fourth Qualifier==== ====Fifth Qualifier==== ====Sixth Qualifier==== ====Seventh Qualifier==== ====Eighth Qualifier==== == References == == External links == * Draw Boys' Singles US Open, 2018 Boys' Singles
title: 2018 US Open – Boys' Singles
